box.whichBox: Which box contains the treasure? Choose carefully!
box.won: Treasure! You earn {score} points! Right choice.
box.whichBoxFirstRound: Welcome to the practice round. Your task is to find the box with the treasure.
box.wonFirstRound: Treasure found! In the real round, you would have earned {score} points.

rules.1: Cílem hry je získat co nejvíce bodů.
rules.2: V každém kole můžete získát {score} bodů tím, že uhodnete, v které ze dvou krabic je poklad.
rules.4: Pro každé kolo lze zakoupit amulet, který může zvýšit vaše šance na výhru.

amulet.canBuy: Click to purchase the amulet for {price} points
amulet.cannotBuy: You do not have enough points to obtain the amulet

footer.text: The application is part of the dissertation research of Mgr. Markéta Muczková at Palacký University Olomouc. For any inquiries, please contact:

informedConsent.title: Informed Consent for Participation in Research

participation_consent.consent_statement: I agree to participate in the research titled "Decision Making Processes," which is part of a research dissertation.
participation_consent.research_goal: The aim of the research is to clarify the decision-making processes of participants using visual interactive stimuli.
participation_consent.experiment_principle: The principle of the experiment is that participants will be presented with two boxes. The objective for the participants is to guess which box contains the treasure. The selection of the box is made by clicking with the mouse. Before selecting a box, an amulet can be obtained, which may increase the chance of winning. Participants are tasked with collecting the highest number of points over {rounds} rounds.
participation_consent.post_experiment_info: Following this, a questionnaire will be administered, after which participants will learn their predominant thinking style.

participant_rights_and_protection.information_protection_title: Participants’ Information and Protection of Their Rights:
participant_rights_and_protection.data_storage: All data will be stored in a secure repository. Each participant is identified by an anonymization code. Anonymized data from the research will be used to write a scholarly article and dissertation.
participant_rights_and_protection.withdrawal_right: Participants have the right to withdraw from the research and request the deletion of their data, but no later than 30 days from the data collection.

potential_risks_and_minimization.potential_risks: Potential risks include data theft or leakage, which will be minimized by storing data within the secure university network and prohibiting the disclosure of information.

personal_data_processing_consent.consent_declaration: I hereby give consent to researcher Mgr. Markéta Muczková from the CO-LAB Cognitive Laboratory based in Olomouc, tř. Svobody 26, IČ: 61989592 (hereinafter "controller"), to process the following personal data in accordance with Regulation No. 679/2016 on the protection of personal data of natural persons (hereinafter "GDPR"):
personal_data_processing_consent.data_processing_purpose: These personal data are necessary for the purpose of the research. The data will be processed by the controller for the time necessary to fulfill the purpose or until consent is withdrawn.
personal_data_processing_consent.withdrawal_statement: I give explicit consent to the above-mentioned processing. Consent can be withdrawn at any time by sending an email to the contact email marketa.muczkova01@upol.cz.

gdpr_rights.rights_statement: According to GDPR, you have the right to:
gdpr_rights.right_2: Request information on what personal data we process
gdpr_rights.right_3: Request an explanation regarding the processing of personal data
gdpr_rights.right_5: Request correction, deletion of personal data, restriction of processing, and raise an objection to processing

final_declaration.declaration: I declare that I have been sufficiently informed about the research and its objectives, understand the possible risks and the rights I have. I agree to participate in this research under the above-mentioned conditions and consent to the processing of personal data.

result.title: Výsledky experimentu
result.description: Děkujeme za váš čas. Níže vidíte výsledky vašich odpovědí.

thinkingstyle.title: Typ myšlení
thinkingstyle.description: Na grafu vidíte, jak moc se shodují vaše odpovědi s různými typy myšlení. Čím výše je bod, tím více odpovědí se shoduje s daným typem myšlení.

beliefinventory.title: Věroučné přesvědčení
beliefinventory.description: Na grafu vidíte, jak moc se shodují vaše odpovědi s různými typy věroučného přesvědčení. Čím výše je bod, tím více odpovědí se shoduje s daným typem věroučného přesvědčení.

combined.title: Kombinované výsledky
combined.description: Na grafu vidíte, jak moc se shodují vaše odpovědi s různými typy myšlení a věroučného přesvědčení. Čím výše je bod, tím více odpovědí se shoduje s daným typem myšlení nebo věroučného přesvědčení.

s.title: Získané herní skóre
s.description: Vaše skóre získané během hry je {score} bodů.

share.title: Sdílet výsledky
share.description: Pokud chcete, můžete sdílet své výsledky na sociálních sítích. Velmi nám tím pomůžete s výzkumem.

Q1IBI.question: I do something special to prevent bad luck.

Q4IBI.question: Magical forces have impacted on my life.

Q5IBI.question: Most things that happen to us are the result of fate.

Q6IBI.question: I sometimes perform special rituals for protection.

Q7IBI.question: It is not possible to cast a magic spell.

Q8IBI.question: Good luck charms do not work.

Q11IBI.question: I do not believe in a spiritual presence.

Q12IBI.question: I believe in a higher power or God.

Q13IBI.question: The soul does not continue to exist after death.

Q14IBI.question: I believe guardian angels or other spiritual forces protect me.

Q15IBI.question: It is just a matter of time until science can explain everything.

Q16IBI.question: There is an invisible force guiding us all.

Q17IBI.question: Science is the key to understanding how things happen.

Q18IBI.question: I use prayer to ward off misfortune.

Q19IBI.question: Life is nothing more than a series of random events.

Q20IBI.question: If I think too much about something it will happen.

Q21IBI.question: If I think too much about something bad, it will happen.

Q22IBI.question: My thoughts alone can alter reality.

Q23IBI.question: Sometimes I get a feeling that something is going to happen, before it happens.

Q24IBI.question: I have sometimes changed my plans because I had a bad feeling.

Q1TS.question: It is important to be loyal to your beliefs even when evidence is brought to bear against them.

Q2TS.question: Whether something feels true is more important than evidence.

Q3TS.question: Just because evidence conflicts with my current beliefs does not mean my beliefs are wrong.

Q4TS.question: There may be evidence that goes against what you believe but that does not mean you have to change your beliefs.

Q5TS.question: Even if there is concrete evidence against what you believe to be true, it is OK to maintain cherished beliefs.

Q6TS.question: To, o čem věříte, že je to pravda, je důležitější než důkazy, které tomu odporují, bez ohledu na téma.

Q7TS.question: I think there are many wrong ways, but only one right way, to almost anything.

Q8TS.question: In my experience, the truth is often black and white.

Q11TS.question: Either something is true or it is false, there is nothing in-between.

Q12TS.question: There is no middle ground between what is true and what is false.

Q13TS.question: I like to rely on my intuitive impressions.

Q14TS.question: I believe in trusting my hunches.

Q15TS.question: When I make decisions, I tend to rely on my intuition.

Q16TS.question: Using my “gut-feelings” usually works well for me in figuring out problems in my life.

Q17TS.question: Intuition is the best guide in making decisions.

Q18TS.question: I often go by my instincts when deciding on a course of action.

Q19TS.question: I’m not that good at figuring out complicated problems.

Q20TS.question: Thinking is not my idea of an enjoyable activity.

Q21TS.question: I try to avoid situations that require thinking in depth about something.

Q22TS.question: I am not a very analytical thinker.

Q23TS.question: Reasoning things out carefully is not one of my strong points.

Q24TS.question: Thinking hard and for a long time about something gives me little satisfaction.

QamuletEffect.question: To what extent do you think the amulet influenced your success?

QstrategyEffect.question: To what extent do you think your game strategy influenced the outcome?

QchanceEffect.question: What portion of success do you attribute to chance?

QlikeExperience.question: How much did you enjoy this experience?

QfrustrationLevel.question: How frustrating was this experience for you?

email.question: When an article from the research is published in a scholarly journal, we can send it to your email
